title: Tomato and Onion Relish
ingredients: ['1.5kg ripe tomatoes, scored with a cross on the bottom', '700g caster sugar', '700g sliced onions', '500ml brown vinegar', '1 heaped tablespoon mustard powder', '1 heaped tablespoon curry powder', '3 tablespoons cornflour mixed with 4 tablespoons brown vinegar', '25g salt']
